title: Police officer hospitalised after ‘speeding suspect’ mowed him down
text:
The police officer was rushed to hospital after the incident (Picture: @999London)

A police officer has been rushed to hospital after being hit by a car in Tottenham this morning.

He had stopped a ‘suspected vehicle’ at 11.32am before it then ‘drove off at speed’ and hit him, a spokesperson for Met Police confirmed.

Emergency services and an air ambulance were called to the scene and the officer was rushed to hospital.

Police are still awaiting an update on his condition.

Enquiries are underway to locate the suspects and the vehicle, while no arrests have been made at this stage.
